UserCode.Game
Class SeaHorse

java.lang.Object
  UserCode.Game.SeaHorse
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdatable, ISpawnableFacade
public class SeaHorse
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpawnableFacade

SeaHorse initialises and spawns an SeaHorse type pet in the game - it is a Facade. Use one for each pet.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Marc Price

                  double xPosn,
                  double yPosn,
                  double zPosn,

                  double yOrientation,
                  double zOrientation)
           throws java.lang.Exception
METHOD: build and spawn an ISpawnable at the given position/orientation, of the given IWorld.

Specified by:
spawn in interface ISpawnableFacade
Parameters:
factory - IUpdatableFactory for object creation.
world - the IWorld.
speed - the initial speed of the spawnable when spawned.
xPosn - double giving the initial position along the x axis.
yPosn - double giving the initial position along the y axis.
zPosn - double giving the initial position along the z axis.
xOrientation - double giving the initial orientation about x axis.
yOrientation - double giving the initial orientation about y axis.
zOrientation - double giving the initial orientation about z axis.

java.lang.Exception
